thread.title: Ok rooms, disappointing service

author: FÃ©lix L
title: Ok rooms, disappointing service
text: The rooms have an odd configuration but are very clean. The service was terrible and we had multiple problems and there was no answers at the front desk. On one occasion, we finally reached someone and they sent someone who told me he couldn't do anything as soon as I opened the door. Disappointing...
